## Description {#details}

Specifies the location and type of a single stream in the minidump file.

The minidump stream directory is an array of entries of this type, with its size given by <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/minidump/header/#a255d6e4cb11c68599f007278b07bdf86">Header.NumberOfStreams</a>.

Definition at line 137 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/minidump-h">Minidump.h</a>.
